title: Three Little Words
body:
In which Harry worries a little too much about saying “I love you” for the first time.


Harry knew that he loved her. He knew it with all his heart and even more so with his body. He couldn’t tell when he knew it, but he remembered when he realized it.

It had been a rather cold evening, (Y/N) and him had been walking back to her apartment from a dinner with some friends of hers. They had been holding hands the whole way back, until he had suddenly heard her gasp before she had stopped walking.

“H, look”, she had whispered, crouching down on the ground and pointing into a bush on the other side of the road.

“Wha’?”, he had asked, majorly confused, but he still had crouched down beside her on the pavement. He had squinted in the mere direction of where she had pointed, but couldn’t see a reason to be looking there. So he had turned around, looking at his girl instead, and seeing the most adorable smile on her face. Her eyes had glistened from excitement as she had clutched his arm. It was heartwarming, really.

“ ‘t was a bunny”, she said, “it’s been running into the bush, but maybe it’ll come back out if we wait.” Her eyes had never left the bush where the bunny had disappeared into, and her smile hadn’t faltered.

And that’s when he knew. Because he’d stay there for hours, watching a bush where a stupid bunny disappeared into, freezing. All for her, so she wouldn’t stop smiling. Hell, he would even buy her fifty bunnies as pets if he had to. So she’d watched the bushes while he’d watched her, completely startstruck where these strong feelings came from. Well, he’d always known that he liked her very much, and he’s always known that he’d always care for her. But love? He’d never been in love before, at least not like this, but he’d always imagined falling in love to be a process rather than a major discovery like this.

He couldn’t remember if the bunny had actually showed up again or not, all he could remember was his love sitting there with this adorable smile.

And ever since then, he wanted to tell her, but he didn’t. He always backed out last second before saying these three words that meant so much to him. A tiny little part of his worried that she might not feel the same, that she wouldn’t call it love, but a much bigger part wanted it to be the perfect moment. So he’s been thinking about it a lot, if he should tell her over a fancy dinner, or when they shared a romantic bath for stress relief, or even in the process of love-making, but then again, he always brushed it off. Sometimes he wondered if he should’ve told her back then, while they were looking for the bunny. Maybe that would’ve been the perfect time. But these feelings had been so overwhelming for him, so new, that he just couldn’t get it out.

However, the longer he kept his mouth shut about his feelings, the more impatient he got. With every passing opportunity, the desire to just tell her, to tell everyone they knew that he loved her, just got bigger and bigger. Until one day, he couldn’t bear it anymore.

It was literally the worst moment he could’ve imagined, but he had to tell her. He couldn’t keep quiet for even a second longer.

They were sitting on the sofa in her living room, watching a show that she really liked and he’d watch it because she liked it so much. She was cuddled against him while he slowly drew circles on her back with a few of his fingers. Suddenly, he stopped his movements, making (Y/N) look up at him in wonder.

“Why’d you stop? Felt nice”, she said.

“I love you”, he blurted out, completely out of context, which he realized only after these three little words had made their way, finally, to be heard. He sucked in a deep breath, now feeling more unsure that she’d love him back than ever. But now it was a little to late to overthink it, again, as these words were now in the open.

(Y/N) looked at him amazed. His heart dropped, and if he didn’t know any better, he’d say that it stopped momentarily.

“I love you, too”, she said, finally, and he felt like his heart started beating again, now faster than ever, almost overflowing with joy.

“You do?”, he asked almost breathlessly.

“Yeah, I thought you knew tha’, Harry.” She looked at him now with his favourite smile of hers. And yes, he knew. He had always known, infact. But he had to admit that his worry got the better of him.

“Yeah, but we.. never said it, I guess.”

Now (Y/N) sat up next to him, so they could face each other properly. She took his hand in hers as she said: “Yes we did. Just not in these words.”

Harry looked at her confused.

“Harry, c’mon. We say it all the time, really. And we show it to each other. Like, yesterday you told me I was your favourite person to snuggle with. And you always text me when I’m driving to my parents if I got there safely. And don’t tell me you don’t notice how you hug me a little tighter when we won’t be seeing each other for a week or two and tell me how much you’ll miss me.”

Harry had never looked at it that way.

“Oh, you’ve got to be kidding me”, she said as he didn’t respond.

But yes, it made sense to him now. They had said it all the time, and even more, made sure that the other did feel loved. All these little things that he did subsconsciously for her came to his mind again. Buying her favourite brand of peanut butter although he didn’t like it as much, taking one more sweater with him because he knew she’d be cold, putting a towel in the tumbledryer for her when she’d get out of the bathtub.

And she’d done the same for him, he realized. She’d always stay up until he texted her that he landed safely from a flight, and he’d always find some of his favourite smoothies in her fridge although she didn’t even like them.

God, they were so whipped for each other that it was almost ridiculous. The thought of that made him smile brighter than he thought he ever had.

“Guess tha’s true, love”, he said and gave her a delicate peck on the lips, feeling incredibly happy that he finally, finally, got to tell her.

“You’re warm” he said contently as he pulled her into his chest.

“There, you said it again”, she said.

View all of my posts here or request something here!

blog.description:
Hello and welcome to STYLESLOOKBOOK! This blog is dedicated to clothing and accessories worn by Harry Styles.
Contact & inquiries: styleslookbook@gmail.com

summary: At the airport in Philadelphia, Harry was pictured wearing a striped Gucci T-shirt from the Pre-Fall 2019 collection. He was...
caption:
At the airport in Philadelphia, Harry was pictured wearing a striped Gucci T-shirt from the Pre-Fall 2019 collection. He was also wearing this shirt out in London recently. Photo by signofthesky.

Gucci Pre-Fall 2019 T-shirt

blog.name: thedevilinbetweenthesheets
blog.title: Nat
blog.description: Harry Styles' Lover · Ask Me · Masterlist · Creatures of the Night Masterlist · Song Cover Masterlist · Requests are always open !

title: Plus size Y/N
body:
A/N: to Anon that requested for plus size Y/N! I didn’t know I would write so much omg (and sorry if the ending is crappy x). Hope that you’ll like it!

Feel free to drop me some requests or questions,  I’d be more than happy to answer them! (Or just chat with meeee!)

Warnings: Swearing.

Y/N has always been self-conscious about her figure.

She almost only wears oversized and baggy t-shirts and some jeans to cover up her body, and she rarely looks at the mirror. She doesn’t even look at her reflections.

It all started when Y/N was in secondary school. Whenever she passes by the guys from her class, they just laugh at her, and say dumb stuff like: “Scoot over, fatty! You’re blocking my way! ” 

Well, it hurts Y/N’s heart, of course. She didn’t do anything wrong, she’s just passing by and minding her own business.

Sometimes when she’s eating, they’ll say stuff like: “Stop eating so much, you’re already so fat.” and “You’re eating that for lunch? No wonder you’re this big.” 

She acts like she doesn’t care at all, trying to protect herself from those harmful words, but the truth is, she cries herself to bed.

It has been a few years since then and Y/N thinks that she doesn’t really give a fuck about those judgments anymore, all thanks to Harry Styles, her charming and loving boyfriend.  

When Harry first told her that he loves her, she just couldn’t believe it. He’s literally the prince charming in her (and in millions of girls’) heart after all.

He has always been kind to her. He knows all of her concerns, showers her with love and kisses and whenever she feels self-conscious he always tells Y/N she’s the most beautiful girl he had ever laid his eyes on and she had a special place in his heart.

She didn’t think about losing weight before, because she wants her life to be happy. And she certainly didn’t want her life to be controlled by some random people’s words.

Not until when her picture with Harry has flooded with comments of her being big.

“Maybe I should lose some weight.” Y/N told Harry, sitting on the sofa while scrolling through the comments on Instagram.

“What? Gorgeous, you’re already beautiful the way you are.” Harry leans over and took away her phone, laying his head over her lap. “The fuck is this? These people really need to mind their own fucking business.”

“Well, I think they’re telling the truth…”Y/N said, stroking his hair. “I am not like your ex-girlfriends, and not like the other girls. They’re beautiful when they smile, they can wear cute clothes and bathing suits, having mirror selfies… I can’t even look at my own reflections.” 

“Baby.” Harry sits up and kisses her lips. “I love you. I don’t want you to be my ex-girlfriends or the other girls. They’re called ‘exes’ for a reason, right? And my reason is you. You are the one I want, Y/N. ” 

He then kisses on her cheeks. “You are adorable, sweet, charming. Most importantly, you’re beautiful as fuck.”  And another kiss on her forehead, making her giggle. “Mine.”

“As much as I hate to interrupt, but don’t you have some meetings today? In like…” She looked at her watch. “20 minutes?”

“Oh shit, I almost forgot.” Harry jumped up from the sofa, went upstairs to change into his suit. “Princess, I can cancel the meeting if you want me to stay. I don’t want to leave you here alone, especially when you’re in a mood like this.” 

“I’m fine, babe. I’m just messin’ with ya.” Y/N gave him a wink. “Plus, I’m meeting a close friend today.”

“Naughty, aren’t you?” Harry planted a kiss on her forehead and lips. “See you tonight, gorgeous.”

“Bye!” She gave him a big smile, when she’s sure he left, she closed the door and went upstairs to their room and look at the mirror.

I’m not that pretty. 

The alarm that Y/N set rang, telling her to get ready.

“Right, I have stuff to do.” She ignored her negative thoughts, got dressed and headed out to the cafe that she and her friend had set to meet.

When Y/N reached the cafe, her friend, Lily was already there, along with a guy that she assumes is Lily’s boyfriend. 

“Oh, Y/N! Long time no see!” Lily gave Y/N a hug and sat her down. “This is my boyfriend, Arthur.”

“Nice to meet you, Arthur. I thought it was just two of us today, Lily.” Y/N smiled at Arthur.

“Well, I wanted you to meet him! Plus, he drove me here.” Lily said, sipping her iced latte. “Do you want anything to drink? I can get Arthur to order for you.”

“Oh, okay…um… I’ll just have an iced mocha, thank you.” Y/N said while looking for her purse inside her bag.

“Mocha? You’re having that?” Lily asked, looking at her. “I heard that it’s not good for you… you know if you’re on a diet. Oh, babe, can I have some waffles please?” 

Y/N felt embarrassed, she gave them an awkward smile. “It’s okay, I’ll just have a cup of hot water.” 

Arthur nodded and headed to order.

Y/N and Lily started catching up like old friends do, and Arthur was sitting there on his phone while having a couple bites of Lily’s waffle.

“I went to the park the other day with my friend and when we were talking and suddenly this one girl that I didn’t know, came up and pushed me away while I am talking to my friend. She just appeared out of nowhere and wrapped her hand around his arm.” Y/N was thinking about that incident that happened the other day, and suddenly Arthur chipped in and asked: “Did she even had the strength to do that? I mean, you’re bigger than her, right?”

“That’s what I’m thinking!” Lily laughed and looked at Y/N.

“Yeah, haha. Well, she caught me off-guard so of course, I got pushed away.” She explains.

“Oh, before I forgot, I brought this for you.” Lily took something out of her purse. It’s a bottle of pills. “Weight loss pills. I got it for a special price, brought it just for you.”

Y/N faked her smile and took the bottle.

A few hours later after Y/N and Lily are done catching up, She stood up and said goodbye to Lily. She heard them laughing when she’s about to leave. It’s like secondary school all over again. Y/N hates how Lily and Arthur treated her, even if they’re just kidding.

Y/N sat in her car at the parking lot while waiting for her car to warm up, she got a call from Harry.

“Hey beautiful, what do you want for dinner? I’m on my way home. Pizza okay?”

Her tears fell as soon as she heard his voice.

“Nah… I don’t feel like eating pizza. How about salads?” She tried to sound as happy as she could. But she couldn’t fool Harry. “Oh no babe, what happened?”

“What? I’m fine…nothing happened.” She wiped off her tears with her thumb. “I’m gonna drive now, talk to you when I get back?”
“Okay, come home quick, love. I miss you.”

“Miss you too, dimples.” She smiled at the thought of going home to him.

When Y/N reaches home, she saw her beloved boyfriend lying down on the sofa scrolling through his phone, and she immediately felt that there’s much more stuff for her to care about. “Hey honey, I’m home.” 

Harry chuckled and got up from the sofa, heading towards her and giving her a hug. “How’s your day, baby girl?”

“Hmm…fine, I guess.” She buried her head into his chest. “I miss you so much.”

“How’s your friend?” Harry asked, stroking Y/N’s hair. “She’s a bitch.” 

“Okay, then let’s not talk about her. So, salad for dinner? Really?”

“Absolutely not. I didn’t know what’s gotten into me just now. I want pizza.” 

“That’s my girl.” Harry gave her a kiss. “Don’t ever change. I love you just the way you are.”


Y/N was self-conscious with her body, but now she doesn’t give a fuck.

She has Harry now, and he made her life better.

  • I have an alternative version, let me know if you guys wanna read it x

Masterlist

trail.content:
A/N: to Anon that requested for plus size Y/N! I didn’t know I would write so much omg (and sorry if the ending is crappy x). Hope that you’ll like it!

Feel free to drop me some requests or questions,  I’d be more than happy to answer them! (Or just chat with meeee!)

Warnings: Swearing.

Y/N has always been self-conscious about her figure.

She almost only wears oversized and baggy t-shirts and some jeans to cover up her body, and she rarely looks at the mirror. She doesn’t even look at her reflections.

It all started when Y/N was in secondary school. Whenever she passes by the guys from her class, they just laugh at her, and say dumb stuff like: “Scoot over, fatty! You’re blocking my way! ” 

Well, it hurts Y/N’s heart, of course. She didn’t do anything wrong, she’s just passing by and minding her own business.

Sometimes when she’s eating, they’ll say stuff like: “Stop eating so much, you’re already so fat.” and “You’re eating that for lunch? No wonder you’re this big.” 

She acts like she doesn’t care at all, trying to protect herself from those harmful words, but the truth is, she cries herself to bed.

It has been a few years since then and Y/N thinks that she doesn’t really give a fuck about those judgments anymore, all thanks to Harry Styles, her charming and loving boyfriend.  

When Harry first told her that he loves her, she just couldn’t believe it. He’s literally the prince charming in her (and in millions of girls’) heart after all.

He has always been kind to her. He knows all of her concerns, showers her with love and kisses and whenever she feels self-conscious he always tells Y/N she’s the most beautiful girl he had ever laid his eyes on and she had a special place in his heart.

She didn’t think about losing weight before, because she wants her life to be happy. And she certainly didn’t want her life to be controlled by some random people’s words.

Not until when her picture with Harry has flooded with comments of her being big.

“Maybe I should lose some weight.” Y/N told Harry, sitting on the sofa while scrolling through the comments on Instagram.

“What? Gorgeous, you’re already beautiful the way you are.” Harry leans over and took away her phone, laying his head over her lap. “The fuck is this? These people really need to mind their own fucking business.”

“Well, I think they’re telling the truth…”Y/N said, stroking his hair. “I am not like your ex-girlfriends, and not like the other girls. They’re beautiful when they smile, they can wear cute clothes and bathing suits, having mirror selfies… I can’t even look at my own reflections.” 

“Baby.” Harry sits up and kisses her lips. “I love you. I don’t want you to be my ex-girlfriends or the other girls. They’re called ‘exes’ for a reason, right? And my reason is you. You are the one I want, Y/N. ” 

He then kisses on her cheeks. “You are adorable, sweet, charming. Most importantly, you’re beautiful as fuck.”  And another kiss on her forehead, making her giggle. “Mine.”

“As much as I hate to interrupt, but don’t you have some meetings today? In like…” She looked at her watch. “20 minutes?”

“Oh shit, I almost forgot.” Harry jumped up from the sofa, went upstairs to change into his suit. “Princess, I can cancel the meeting if you want me to stay. I don’t want to leave you here alone, especially when you’re in a mood like this.” 

“I’m fine, babe. I’m just messin’ with ya.” Y/N gave him a wink. “Plus, I’m meeting a close friend today.”

“Naughty, aren’t you?” Harry planted a kiss on her forehead and lips. “See you tonight, gorgeous.”

“Bye!” She gave him a big smile, when she’s sure he left, she closed the door and went upstairs to their room and look at the mirror.

I’m not that pretty. 

The alarm that Y/N set rang, telling her to get ready.

“Right, I have stuff to do.” She ignored her negative thoughts, got dressed and headed out to the cafe that she and her friend had set to meet.

When Y/N reached the cafe, her friend, Lily was already there, along with a guy that she assumes is Lily’s boyfriend. 

“Oh, Y/N! Long time no see!” Lily gave Y/N a hug and sat her down. “This is my boyfriend, Arthur.”

“Nice to meet you, Arthur. I thought it was just two of us today, Lily.” Y/N smiled at Arthur.

“Well, I wanted you to meet him! Plus, he drove me here.” Lily said, sipping her iced latte. “Do you want anything to drink? I can get Arthur to order for you.”

“Oh, okay…um… I’ll just have an iced mocha, thank you.” Y/N said while looking for her purse inside her bag.

“Mocha? You’re having that?” Lily asked, looking at her. “I heard that it’s not good for you… you know if you’re on a diet. Oh, babe, can I have some waffles please?” 

Y/N felt embarrassed, she gave them an awkward smile. “It’s okay, I’ll just have a cup of hot water.” 

Arthur nodded and headed to order.

Y/N and Lily started catching up like old friends do, and Arthur was sitting there on his phone while having a couple bites of Lily’s waffle.

“I went to the park the other day with my friend and when we were talking and suddenly this one girl that I didn’t know, came up and pushed me away while I am talking to my friend. She just appeared out of nowhere and wrapped her hand around his arm.” Y/N was thinking about that incident that happened the other day, and suddenly Arthur chipped in and asked: “Did she even had the strength to do that? I mean, you’re bigger than her, right?”

“That’s what I’m thinking!” Lily laughed and looked at Y/N.

“Yeah, haha. Well, she caught me off-guard so of course, I got pushed away.” She explains.

“Oh, before I forgot, I brought this for you.” Lily took something out of her purse. It’s a bottle of pills. “Weight loss pills. I got it for a special price, brought it just for you.”

Y/N faked her smile and took the bottle.

A few hours later after Y/N and Lily are done catching up, She stood up and said goodbye to Lily. She heard them laughing when she’s about to leave. It’s like secondary school all over again. Y/N hates how Lily and Arthur treated her, even if they’re just kidding.

Y/N sat in her car at the parking lot while waiting for her car to warm up, she got a call from Harry.

“Hey beautiful, what do you want for dinner? I’m on my way home. Pizza okay?”

Her tears fell as soon as she heard his voice.

“Nah… I don’t feel like eating pizza. How about salads?” She tried to sound as happy as she could. But she couldn’t fool Harry. “Oh no babe, what happened?”

“What? I’m fine…nothing happened.” She wiped off her tears with her thumb. “I’m gonna drive now, talk to you when I get back?”
“Okay, come home quick, love. I miss you.”

“Miss you too, dimples.” She smiled at the thought of going home to him.

When Y/N reaches home, she saw her beloved boyfriend lying down on the sofa scrolling through his phone, and she immediately felt that there’s much more stuff for her to care about. “Hey honey, I’m home.” 

Harry chuckled and got up from the sofa, heading towards her and giving her a hug. “How’s your day, baby girl?”

“Hmm…fine, I guess.” She buried her head into his chest. “I miss you so much.”

“How’s your friend?” Harry asked, stroking Y/N’s hair. “She’s a bitch.” 

“Okay, then let’s not talk about her. So, salad for dinner? Really?”

“Absolutely not. I didn’t know what’s gotten into me just now. I want pizza.” 

“That’s my girl.” Harry gave her a kiss. “Don’t ever change. I love you just the way you are.”


Y/N was self-conscious with her body, but now she doesn’t give a fuck.

She has Harry now, and he made her life better.

  • I have an alternative version, let me know if you guys wanna read it x
